sentences.en: ...a 76,000-ton barge pulled by five tug boats.
sentences.cn: …被5艘拖船拖拉着的一艘76000吨的驳船。

sentences.en: As it taxied towards the tug the pilot released his torpedo.
sentences.cn: 飞行员驾机滑向拖轮,随后投了鱼雷.

sentences.en: Bobby gave her hair a tug.
sentences.cn: 博比使劲拽了她头发一下.

sentences.en: Chelsea and Aston Villa were involved in a tug of war for Liverpool's Ray Houghton last night.
sentences.cn: 切尔西队与阿斯顿维拉队昨夜上演了一场夺人大战，争购利物浦的雷·霍顿。

sentences.en: He gave a tug at a glistening, pale piece of her hair.
sentences.cn: 他拉了拉安娜一缕暗淡闪光的头发.

sentences.en: In a tug - of - war , the competitors pull as hard as they can.
sentences.cn: 在拔河比赛中, 双方队员都拼命地拉.

sentences.en: She knows exactly how to tug at readers' heartstrings.
sentences.cn: 她对如何牵动读者的心弦了如指掌。

sentences.en: She removed the bandage with a sharp tug.
The tug crossed our stern not fifty yards away.
sentences.cn: 拖船擦着我们的船尾开了过去，距离不到50码。

sentences.en: The tug eased into the narrow docking space.
sentences.cn: 拖船小心地驶入狭窄的码头停泊处.

sentences.en: The tug is towing three barges.
sentences.cn: 那只拖船正拖着三只驳船.

sentences.en: The tug nearly turned turtle twice, but I managed to keep her upright.
sentences.cn: 拖船两次都差点翻个儿，但我设法稳住了船身。

sentences.en: The tug stiffened when we got into the mud.
sentences.cn: 我们陷入泥里时,牵拉更费劲了.

sentences.en: The tug was seaward of the Hakai Passage on a course that diverged from the Calvert Island coastline.
sentences.cn: 托船驶离卡尔弗特岛海岸朝哈凯航道驶去。

sentences.en: The woman gently tugged his arm.
sentences.cn: 那女人轻轻拽了拽他的胳膊。

sentences.en: This dual tug is apparent in the whole movement of expatriation.
sentences.cn: 这种两面周旋的态度在整个寄居海外运动中极为明显.

sentences.en: Tom felt a tug at his sleeve.
sentences.cn: 汤姆觉得袖子被人拉了一下.

words.tran_cn: 拖拉装置绞车；轻便绞车；拖拉器；卷扬机

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)孩子监护权的争夺；“爱之拔河”
拔河，拔河比赛；两派间的激烈竞争

trans.tran_cn: 猛拉，推力，绳索链条，[航海] 拖船，竞争，斗争
trans.tran_en: a small strong boat used for pulling or guiding ships into a port, up a river etc
to pull with one or more short, quick pulls
to pull with one or more short, quick pulls

trans.tran_cn: 用力拉，使劲拉，使劲，挣扎，[航海]用拖船拖曳，竞争

trans.tran_en: to pull with one or more short, quick pulls
